attributes.action: Encourage Birmingham City Council to help fund and build a new Stadium and sports development for the city of Birmingham.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Birmingham City FC wish to create a development for the City of Birmingham which will create jobs, sports and leisure facilties for the city as a whole.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Encourage Birmingham City Council to help fund and build a new Stadium and sports development for the city of Birmingham."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13565.asp

Prime Minister's Office
